tool_description: NBA Results API offering comprehensive game details including scores, highlights, quarter scores, leading scorers, and more. Access a wide range of information on every NBA game to cater to the needs of fans and developers alike.
name: NBA Results Pro
title: NBA Results Pro

api_list.name: Get NBA season information by team ID
api_list.description: Get NBA season information by team ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nba-results-pro.p.rapidapi.com/nba/teams/1/season/information"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nba-results-pro.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nba-results-pro.p.rapidapi.com/nba/teams/{team_id}/season/information"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nba-results-pro.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
